comment: Great Professor for math. She is very nice and gives extra credit for almost everything. Attendance is not mandatory but if you skip class and need a grade bump at the end of the semester she won't help. Instruction is clear and easy to follow. Would recommend her.

I loved Professor Jenkins!  She shows how much she cares about the class.  She used to be a high school teacher which makes her the perfect teacher for a student who is still trying to get the ways of college.

She was such a good proefessor and made my first college math course a breeze. Show up, pay attention and you'lldo well on pop quizzes and tests. She offers extra credit a lot and will stay before or after to help struggling students. Very sweet high school-like math teacher, and was comforting during my first semester. Take her if you can. Easy A.

Mrs. Jenkins is awesome! She will take the time to help you if you are not understanding anything. Her explanations are extremely clear. She gives bonus points on each test. Class is easy if you go and ask for help when you need it. Attendance not mandatory but if you don't go to class you will miss quizzes and you cannot make those up.
Absolutely amazing, she is the sweetest lady ever. Gives extra credit for every test and bonus questions on every quiz. She makes it so easy. I love her, take her if you can!!

I love Professor Jenkins! First off, she's the nicest lady you will ever meet. She genuinely loves all of her students and takes great pride in them. She helps so much; just ask! She is very, VERY clear on everything from grading to lectures. She writes all problems on the overhead. Best professor I have EVER had at KSU. Just go to class everyday(:

She's super clear in her explanations, and helps to make the material understandable, no matter how many questions she gets. She has a couple of student tutors to help the students succeed as well. She's serious about the mental presence of the class: don't bring a laptop or cell phone! She'll call you out, but she's so sweet about it! Loved her!

AMAZING PROFESSOR!!! Four tests, ten quizzes, and a final. A couple points for extra credit is given pretty often for quizzes and tests. Homework assigned every night but it helps a ton for reviewing for quizzes and tests. Class before test is a review day every time. Always goes over homework and is extremely helpful. Super clear during lectures.

She's a very good professor when it comes to delivering the information. But, she can get extremely boring sometimes. I found myself dozing off all the time. She takes up pretty much all homework, do it. There are a lot of quizzes and tests are easy. The class is very easy. If you have to take college algebra, take her.

She was a great professor. Easy to understand. Works things out step by step. There will be several pop quizzes. Sometimes she'll hint at them, but sometimes she won't. There's a lot of homework that will be taken up so do it! Do the homework from the book first because it's usually do before the online homework. Doesn't like cellphonelaptops out.

SWEETEST MOST UNDERSTANDING TEACHER EVER! Take her!! I let a student borrow my calculator for a test and she bought me new batteries for my calculator! SO SWEET. I would take her again if I could! Her teaching style is great and she cares about her students!

Great professor! Really cared about students! Gave 10 pop quizzes in the class but took the top 8. Every quiz and test had extra credit. attendance not mandatory but you want to go in case of a pop quiz. TAKE HER!

Shes a nice lady, but she is not the professor to take if you are weak in math. She has pop quizzes all the time over some material that she has never went over, she also assigns home work that she doesn't go over. Until after you do it. If you are strong in math then you might not have a problem, otherwise I would find a better alternative.

Professor Jenkins is an absolute darling lady. She wants for her students to succeed and is interested in her student's lives outside of the class. One of the best and sweetest professors I have had at KSU. There are four test, at least eight quizzes, section homework, and one comprehensive final. TAKE HER!!

She's wonderful, sweet, and knowledgable. She does her best to help in any way she can, and if you come to class she explains clearly. You can tell she loves her job, and she makes math enjoyable. I'm not the best at math, but I worked hard and got an A. I highly recommend Prof Jenkins. Enjoyed this class.

She is a great teacher! Very sweet and helpful with any questions you have. Homework every other day and mymathlab once in a while. I really have nothing to complain about her. Definitely take her for your math class!
She's awesome. Extremely helpful and not strict when it comes to homework. The test/quizzes are easy and she's always willing to help. She also makes effort in knowing everyone in the class.
Such a sweet lady! Very helpful, merciful with unfinished homework assignments, tests are not challenging, easy class! Definitely recommend her.

Very sweet lady. She will help anyone who needs it and is willing to go over any questions. Very helpful with her teaching style and explanations. Math is not my strong place and I actually came out with a B in her class.

Lots of extra credit on tests and quizes.It's math; if you practice you can get A. Pro. Jenkins makes all the test as simplistic as possible. She's only concerned that you know how to work the problem. Gives partial credit if u show ur work on tests, so do! Attendence counts if ur borderline. She is very helpful so don't hesitate to ask 4 help!
nice & helpful teacher

She is SO NICE! Great at teaching, very clear about assignments, always open to answering questions, she is one of the best teachers I have had at Kennesaw. She even takes the time to learn everyone's name. She actually cares about her students, and you will do well if you take her.

Mrs. Jenkins was a great teacher. Very helpful and explains problems thoroughly. If you keep up with the homework and pay attention in class, you can easily get a B. Provides pre-printed notes online to help pay attention to the examples instead of writing down all the problems. Great teacher ! =D

Mrs. Jenkins is brilliant. She is extremely helpful. She responds to any and all questions in a very timely manner. She is kind and patient. She gives just the appropriate amount of work to keep students on their toes. Only grades 12/12 quizzes. She has made me (a student who once disliked math) enjoy math for once! She is excellent. A+ professor!

Mrs. Jenkins is brilliant. She is extremely helpful. She responds to any and all questions in a very timely manner. She is kind and patient. She gives just the appropriate amount of work to keep students on their toes. Only 10/12 quizzes graded. She has made me (a student who once disliked math) enjoy math for once! She is excellent. A+ professor!
Was a great teacher. Would come early for those that needed the extra help. Would recommend here.

One of the easiest teachers you can take! She takes time to explain each and every problem and makes sure you completely understand. Homework is assigned but helps a whole lot. Mrs.Jenkins is one of my favorite teachers and I would take her for all my math classes if I could! Highly recommend her!!
Professor Jenkins is amazing! She's very approachable and the class is almost like highschool. Homework is assigned but it helps. If I could, I would take  another class with Jenkins.

HIGHLY recommend. She is ultra nice, really cares, great sense of humor. If Algebra scares you, Prof. Jenkins is the absolute perfect professor for the subject. Retired HS teacher. Methodical, meticulous, great system. Perfect for non-traditional or adults who've been away from math awhile. If you're strong in Algebra, the pace may be a bit slow.

I absolutely ADORE this teacher! she is the best! she's sooo helpful and tries to make sure everyone does good. She reviews the notes from the day before and genuinely cares about her students. She does this thing with her final where 90% of it replaces your lowest test grade! highly recommend her!
No Comments
She is such a sweet and caring teacher. I would never have passed had I had a different teacher. She genuinely cares about her students. Love her

Prof Jenkins really cares if you pass her class. Even if you're never in class (skip alot) she will still go out of her way to print you out extra notes and make sure you get the help you need. She cares about her students and does everything she can to help you with all issues. She tries to make things easy on.
